name: OVERLIGHT (Upwards17)
description:
Train your reflexes, dodge, shoot and destroy your enemies, use everything that can help you to survive and climb to the top in this frenetic twin stick shooter!

👑 CAMPAING 👑

Challenge rounds of enemies to the rhythm of music and show them who is the stronger. upgrade your weapons to increase your chances and maybe grab a shield for safety. discover new enemies and bosses with their unique abilities, try to understand their moves before they got you. reach the final boss of every chapter and try not to be defeated!

☠  SURVIVAL  ☠

Survive as much as possible. make the highest score trying to keep the multiplier always high. the enemies will be more and more, good luck!
